page.title: 02Tourism
page.content: Rothbury attracts a lot of visitors during summertime. They flock to the riverside where I live and unfortunately, many of them leave litter behind. This upsets the residents because they try to keep the place tidy. All the shops seem to become overcrowded and it is difficult to find a parking space in the main street. There are two toy shops which I like to visit and a newsagents which also sells toys. It is very busy in the summer because it sells sweets, books, cards, etc. There are not enough parking spaces for cars in the main street so they end up in the side streets, causing a lot of congestion. I think that some local people feel better when the streets are not so overcrowded.
